bibdata.title: IEEE Guide for Development of Specifications for Turnkey Substation Projects
IEEE Guide for Development of Specifications for Turnkey Substation Projects

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Systematic methodology, guidelines and practices for developing turnkey substation specifications are provided in this guide. Guidance on engineering, procurement, construction, testing and commissioning, quality assurance/quality control and training is provided.

Systematic methodology, guidelines and practices for developing turnkey substation specifications are provided in this guide. Guidance on engineering, procurement, construction, testing and commissioning, quality assurance/quality control and training is provided.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
